success_criteria: Unit test coverage > 80%; All unit/integration tests passing; SonarQube quality gate passed (no new bugs, vulnerabilities, or code smells); Snyk scan finds no new critical/high vulnerabilities.
escalation_procedure: PR author must fix issues before merge is allowed.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and known vulnerabilities from entering the main branch.

trigger_event: Successful build and push to ECR
success_criteria: 100% pass rate on the E2E smoke test suite (covering login, search, add to cart, and basic order placement).
failure_action: Rollback deployment to staging; Trigger P1 alert to the on-call developer.
escalation_procedure: On-call developer investigates and fixes the issue.
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment is always in a testable, stable state for further QA.

success_criteria: Full E2E regression suite passed in Staging (<1% failure rate); No P0/P1 bugs open; Performance tests show no degradation against baseline; Manual sign-off from QA Lead and Product Owner.
failure_action: Abort production release; schedule emergency triage meeting.
escalation_procedure: CTO approval required for any bypass.
business_impact: Prevents critical defects from reaching production, protecting revenue and user trust.
